name: Deep Inside The Dungeon (Abyssals Pixel Game Jam #2)
name_original: Deep Inside The Dungeon (Abyssals Pixel Game Jam #2)
description:
Deep inside the Dungeon, and it only goes deeper,  how many rooms can you visit before your die? 

In this Rougelike dungeon Crawler you have to go from door to door and kill all the enemies, while they get stronger with each room. How can you compete? by giving one of your lives to Jack the Shopkeeper for some stats up. The deals get better the deeper you are in that dungeon, but is it worth it to hold onto your lifes for a little longer? or will you lose all your lifes because you  werent strong enough?

Controls:
  • WASD - Movement
  • Left Mouse Button -  Sword Swing
  • E - Interact

Linux version wasnt tested

Made by Wavemonade, Lauch and Grimm

Made For the  Abyssal's Pixel Game Jam #2
